title.en: Prayer to the Mañjughoṣa Guru, Sakya Paṇḍita1

text.en: O Mañjughoṣa Guru Sakya Paṇḍita, so that I might carry out all the activity that delights you,
text.en-trans: jamyang lama sakya pandita khyé tuk gyepé trinlé tamché jesu drubpé ledu

text.en: Mañjughoṣa Guru, embodiment of all sources of refuge,
text.en-trans: jamyang lama kyabné kündü khyé la

text.en: With heartfelt faith, I prostrate myself before you.
On the basis of this method, inspire me with your blessings, that I may perfect the twofold accumulation of three incalculable aeons within a single instant!
text.en-trans: tab di la ten né kalpa drangmé sum gyi tsok nyi kechik nyi la dzokpar jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: Inspire me with your blessings, that I may cleanse and purify all my misdeeds, obscurations, faults and downfalls, together with their habitual tendencies, right away within a single instant!
text.en-trans: dikdrib nyetung drimé tsok bakchak dang chepa tamché kechik la danta nyi du jang zhing dakpar jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: Let the blessings of the Mañjughoṣa Guru seep into my heart
text.en-trans: jamyang lamé jinlab nying la zhuk né

text.en: And cause all the qualities of study, contemplation and meditation to be perfected within a single moment.
text.en-trans: tö sam gom sum gyi yönten tamché kechik nyi la yongsu dzok né

text.en: Inspire me with your blessings, that I may be able to benefit the teachings and sentient beings on a scale equal to space itself.
text.en-trans: tenpa dang semchen gyi dön namkhé ta dang nyampar drub nüpar jingyi lab tu sol
